title: 'Said he would reach in 10mins': How Delhi biker '200 metres from home' fell into killer pit
content: In a heartbreaking turn of events in Janakpuri, 25-year-old call centre worker Kamal Dhyani was found dead in a construction pit. Just moments before he went missing, he had assured his family he was only ten minutes from home. His motorcycle was located nearby, raising serious questions about community safety and the response time to his prior lack of communication.

title: No duty concessions on sensitive grains, fruits, dairy: Highlights from India-US trade deal
content: India and the US have reached a framework for an interim trade agreement, significantly cutting US tariffs on Indian goods to 18% and easing duties on American food and agricultural products. This de-escalates trade tensions and paves the way for a broader bilateral trade pact, with India planning substantial purchases of US energy and technology products.

title: BJP names Ritu Tawde as Mumbai mayoral candidate; Shiv Sena picks Sanjay Ghadi for deputy mayor
content: The BJP has nominated Ghatkopar corporator Ritu Tawde as its mayoral candidate for the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC). The Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena has named Sanjay Ghadi as their candidate for Deputy Mayor. The BJP-Shinde alliance, with 118 corporators, is confident of winning both posts.

title: Man lost wife to Indore water tragedy, dies in hospital 40 days later
content: A 70-year-old man has died just weeks after his wife succumbed to diarrhoea. Both illnesses were linked to contaminated water in Bhagirathpura. The man's family is now mourning two losses in 40 days. The district administration had previously compensated the family for the wife's death. The water contamination crisis has affected thousands in the area.

title: Sam Altman's 'Elon Musk dream' may be coming true, here's how
content: Elon Musk may soon face questioning under oath regarding the closure of USAID. A US judge has ordered Musk to testify in a lawsuit alleging his direct involvement in the agency's shutdown. The court cited Musk's public claims and "personal, first-hand knowledge" as crucial for resolving the case, despite government objections.

title: Ola, Uber and other app-based taxi drivers to hold day-long strike ‚Äì all you need to know
content: App-based transport workers nationwide protested on February 7, demanding fair incomes and protection against exploitation. Unions cited falling earnings and rising costs, urging governments to implement minimum base fares as mandated by 2025 guidelines. The strike highlighted concerns over unilateral pricing by platforms and financial burdens from device changes, with workers seeking statutory protections.

title: ‚ÄòFriends yes, masters no‚Äô: BNP releases manifesto ahead of polls - what it says about its neighbours
content: Bangladesh's main opposition BNP has unveiled its election manifesto, promising electoral reforms and a tougher foreign policy focused on border security and river-water sharing. The party aims for a "Bangladesh Before All" doctrine, emphasizing "equality and self-dignity" and a "Friend Yes, Master No" approach to international relations.

title: Which American products are about to get cheaper in India
content: India and the US have announced a framework for an interim trade agreement, which will see India reduce tariffs on various US food and agricultural products. This move aims to make American imports cheaper for Indian consumers and ease trade tensions. The agreement also includes reciprocal tariff reductions on Indian goods entering the US.

title: Elon Musk on his 'hiring problem' at SpaceX: Hard to get engineers with families to ‚Ä¶
content: SpaceX faces a significant hurdle in attracting engineers and technicians to its Starbase facility in South Texas due to limited job prospects for their spouses. Elon Musk highlighted this 'significant other' problem, noting the remote location's scarcity of non-SpaceX employment. This challenge, though less severe, also impacts Tesla's recruitment in Texas, contrasting with easier relocations from California's job-rich areas.

title: Exclusive: 'Until he plays Tests, he isn‚Äôt a big 'cricketer'‚ÄîSooryavanshi‚Äôs father
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi smoked 15 sixes and 15 fours at a strike rate of 218.75 during a brutal and breathtaking knock in the U-19 World Cup final against England at the Harare Sports Club in Zimbabwe. Back home in his village in Bihar‚Äôs Samastipur district, his family had hardly caught any sleep, while his coach‚Äôs phone in Patna was buzzing with congratulatory messages and strange requests: ‚ÄúSir, mera beta do saal ka hai, usko cricketer Vaibhav bana dijiye (My son is two years old, make him like Vaibhav).‚Äù

title: 'Facing financial problems': Ex-owner of Multani Bakery jumps to death from 17th floor
content: Former Multani Bakery owner Sunil Sadarangani, 59, died by suicide by jumping from a 17th-floor apartment in Solapur. He had shifted to Pune after selling the bakery due to debt and psychological issues. Sadarangani returned to Solapur to commit the act, evading security checks.

title: ‚ÄòIn 36 months, the cheapest place to put AI will be ‚Ä¶‚Äô: Musk makes a bold prediction
content: Elon Musk predicts space will become the most cost-effective location for AI data centers within three years. He cited advantages like five times greater solar panel efficiency, no need for batteries due to constant sunlight, and the absence of atmospheric interference.

title: H5N1 virus scare in Chennai: Doctor shares risks, symptoms and preventive tips
content: India is on high alert for bird flu (H5N1) following over 1,500 positive crow cases in Chennai, intensifying surveillance in Tamil Nadu. While human infections are rare, H5N1 poses a severe health risk, particularly to vulnerable groups. Experts urge caution, emphasizing preventive measures like avoiding sick birds and maintaining hygiene.

title: 'Dost dost na raha': Congress takes filmy jibe at India-US trade deal
content: Congress MP Jairam Ramesh criticized the recent India-US trade framework, alleging it benefits American farmers at India's expense and includes a commitment to stop Russian oil imports. He questioned the value of "photo-ops" given the perceived lack of substantial benefits for India in the deal.

title: BCCI contracts: Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma may be moved to Grade B
content: Jasprit Bumrah, Shubman Gill, and Ravindra Jadeja are the only players to receive Grade A central contracts for 2025-26. Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, now playing only ODIs, have been moved to Grade B. The BCCI has also announced contracts for 30 male and 22 female players, with Jemimah Rodrigues promoted to Grade A in the women's category.

title: 'Punjabi gana nahi, Bhojpuri lagega': Vaibhav Sooryavanshi's post-title celebration
content: India clinched a record sixth U-19 World Cup title with a dominant 100-run victory over England. Star performer Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, who smashed 175, led the joyous celebrations with his teammates. The young squad's fearless approach and hard work culminated in this historic triumph, continuing India's World Cup legacy.

title: ‚ÄòWe bowed and then an explosion‚Äô: Witnesses recall suicide blast that tore through Pakistan mosque
content: A suicide bombing at a mosque in Islamabad killed at least 31 people and injured dozens more, with the death toll expected to rise. The Islamic State group claimed responsibility for the attack, which involved gunfire before the explosion. This marks the deadliest incident in the capital since 2008.

title: How ready are defending champions India for T20 World Cup title defence at home?
content: Defending champions India enter the ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup 2026 as overwhelming favourites, showcasing a revitalised squad under Suryakumar Yadav. Following a generational shift, the team has embraced a high-octane philosophy, boasting a dominant recent record and top-ranked players. India aim for a third title with a confident, albeit with a few lingering concerns, lineup.

title: Former West Indies pacer points out biggest 'difference-maker' for India's title defence
content: Former West Indies fast bowler Ian Bishop believes India will defend their T20 World Cup title with confidence, citing their strong recent form and experienced squad. He highlights Abhishek Sharma and Jasprit Bumrah as key players, emphasizing bowling depth as a crucial factor for World Cup success.

title: 'Filmed act, took selfies': Spa employee gang-raped after owner refuses to pay extortion money
content: A spa employee in Thiruvalla was allegedly gang-raped by a Kaapa case accused and five accomplices after the owner refused to pay extortion money. The prime accused, Subin Alexander, and another individual were arrested. The victim was threatened with a knife, filmed, and assaulted during the incident.

title: US tariffs on India cut to 18%; $30 trillion market access ‚Äì trade deal explained in 10 points
content: India and the US have announced a framework for an interim trade agreement, significantly reducing tariffs on Indian goods to 18%. This pact aims to boost bilateral trade, with India committing to substantial purchases of US energy and defense products, while also addressing non-tariff barriers and promoting digital trade.

title: Are your job applications going nowhere? Blame ghost listings and r√©sum√© black holes
content: Job rejections may feel personal, but new research by LiftMyCV suggests the system is largely to blame. An analysis of 100,000 job listings reveals that over 40% are dormant ‚Äúghost jobs,‚Äù while automated filters block most r√©sum√©s from human review. The result is a misleading job market where effort often disappears into a digital black hole.

title: 'Consequences are very steep': Trump gives update on US-Iran talks; follows it with stark warning
content: President Trump has signed an executive order allowing tariffs on countries trading with Iran, citing a 25% example. This move comes as Trump described ongoing US-Iran talks as "very good" and expressed optimism about a potential deal, while also warning of "steep consequences" if negotiations fail. The administration aims to hold Iran accountable for its nuclear program and regional destabilization.

title: 'Aim to deepen defence, security ties': PM Modi embarks on two-day visit to Malaysia
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is on a significant two-day visit to Malaysia to bolster defense, security, and economic ties. This trip aims to deepen the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership, with discussions focusing on defense cooperation, innovation, and new collaborative areas. PM Modi will also engage with the vibrant Indian diaspora in Kuala Lumpur.

title: Row over seat in Mumbai local: Assistant manager loses eye in attack; one arrested
content: A commuter's life has been shattered after losing an eye to a stone thrown during a local train argument. The accused, a labourer, was apprehended by police after a thorough investigation involving CCTV footage. The victim, a young professional, faces an uncertain future due to the permanent vision loss.

title: 3rd wife of BJP councillor stabbed to death by stepson in Madhya Pradesh
content: A BJP councillor's wife was brutally stabbed to death in Mandsaur by two assailants. Police have arrested her stepson and his accomplice, suspecting family tensions over the councillor's recent marriage as the motive. The victim was attacked while entering an auto-rickshaw. Investigators are reviewing CCTV footage from surrounding areas.

title: 'Assault on free speech': Comedian Kunal Kamra moves Bombay HC against Sahyog portal
content: Senior advocate Haresh Jagtiani and comedian Kunal Kamra have challenged new IT rules and the Sahyog Portal in the High Court. They argue these measures bypass legal safeguards, including hearings for content originators, and violate free speech rights. The petitions seek to suspend the portal and ensure takedowns follow established procedures.

title: India, US reach interim trade pact framework: What's in the deal
content: India and the United States have agreed to a framework for an interim trade deal, signaling a de-escalation of recent trade tensions. This agreement reaffirms their commitment to broader Bilateral Trade Agreement negotiations. The US also lifted punitive tariffs imposed on Indian goods over its Russian oil imports.

title: IND vs USA preview: Suryakumar Yadav and Co's aura, invincibility and 'nazar'
content: Despite injuries and uncertainty on the eve of the T20 World Cup, India begin their home campaign as overwhelming favourites under Suryakumar Yadav and Gautam Gambhir. With an unbeaten bilateral record, recent titles and a transformed approach to the format, India carry an aura of invincibility. The challenge now is in handling expectations, pressure and the ever-present fear of 'nazar'.

title: ‚ÄòHarvard is woke, we are not‚Äô: US to cut ties, end military training with Ivy League giant
content: The US Pentagon will stop all military training and fellowship programs with Harvard University starting in the 2026-27 academic year. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth stated Harvard no longer meets the needs of the War Department. This action is part of a broader campaign by the Trump administration against the university.

title: Trump signs executive order lifting 25% tariff penalty on India
content: US President Donald Trump has revoked the additional 25% tariff on Indian imports, previously imposed due to New Delhi's Russian oil purchases. This decision follows a recent trade deal where India agreed to reduce these imports. The move aims to ease trade tensions and comes as India has already begun scaling back its Russian oil acquisitions.

title: Top Jaish, LeT men call for jihad, threaten to strike Delhi, Agra
content: Top commanders from Pakistan-based terror groups JeM and LeT have issued direct threats against India and global powers during rallies coinciding with 'Kashmir Solidarity Day'.  Speeches incited violence, calling for jihad and targeting major Indian cities like Delhi and Agra.  Intelligence agencies are on high alert for potential cross-border attacks.

title: Suniel Shetty reveals he was cast in Aditya Dhar‚Äôs ‚ÄòThe Immortal Ashwatthama‚Äô
content: Actor Sunil Shetty praised Aditya Dhar‚Äôs 'Dhurandhar', calling the director‚Äôs vision ‚Äúamazing.‚Äù He revealed he was earlier cast in Dhar‚Äôs shelved film 'The Immortal Ashwatthama'. Shetty admired Ranveer Singh‚Äôs performance, saying he outshone others through his unique portrayal, and lauded Dhar‚Äôs understanding of post-pandemic audiences and long-format storytelling.

title: Usman Tariq's untold story: A cricketing journey inspired by MS Dhoni's biopic
content: Usman Tariq has lately grabbed attention for his bowling action despite being cleared of any wrongdoing by the ICC. The Pakistan spinner has had a life worthy of a Bollywood movie: lost his father early, struggled to survive as a youngster and turned to cricket inspired by MS Dhoni's biopic.

title: 'Papa, pranaam': Vaibhav Sooryavanshi's emotional first words with trophy go viral
content: Teen sensation Vaibhav Sooryavanshi's record-shattering 175 powered India to a sixth U-19 World Cup title, defeating England by 100 runs. The 14-year-old's breathtaking innings, featuring 15 sixes, set a daunting target. Sooryavanshi also secured Player of the Tournament, showcasing his immense talent and dedication.

title: Happy rose day 2026: Top 50 wishes, messages and quotes for your special someone
content: Rose Day ushers in Valentine's Week on February 7, 2026. This occasion celebrates love with the symbolic language of roses. Red roses signify passion, pink denotes affection, yellow represents friendship, and white symbolizes purity. The day offers a chance to express feelings through flowers and heartfelt messages, reconnecting with timeless romance in a digital age.

title: 'Didn't make a mistake': Trump refuses to apologise for post depicting Obamas as apes
content: President Trump refused to apologise for a racist video depicting the Obamas as apes, which he posted and then deleted. He claimed he hadn't seen the offensive content and blamed a staffer, despite acknowledging he watched part of it. The White House initially defended the post before stating a staffer made an error.

title: Delhi cop held after girlfriend shoots self dead with his service pistol in Noida Extension
content: A Delhi Police head constable was arrested after his girlfriend allegedly shot herself with his service pistol following an argument triggered by a call from his wife. The 34-year-old woman, who was in a relationship with the married constable for five years, succumbed to her injuries. Her family alleges the constable lied about his marital status and pressured her.

title: Backlift like Lara, world champion at 14: Rise and rise of unconventional Sooryavanshi
content: Still two-years younger than what Sachin Tendulkar's age was at the time of his India debut, he has a bat-swing that reminds of Brian Charles Lara, Harmanpreet Kaur, and Yuvraj Singh, and like footballer Lamine Yamal, who has emerged as a teenage sensation at the highest level, Sooryavanshi‚Äôs age has rarely matched the stage he performs on.

title: 3rd extension in UP SIR: 1 more month for filing claims
content: The Election Commission has granted a one-month extension for filing claims and objections on Uttar Pradesh's draft electoral rolls, now allowing submissions until March 6. This marks the third extension for the state's voter list revision, with the final rolls to be published on April 10.

title: Detroit Pistons vs New York Knicks: Preview, lineups, injuries & more
content: The New York Knicks are set to face the Detroit Pistons tonight at 7:30 pm ET. The Knicks, with a 33-18 record, rely on Jalen Brunson and Mikal Bridges. The Pistons, holding a 37-13 record, look to Cade Cunningham and Ausar Thompson for victory. Several key players are listed as questionable or out for both teams.

title: Cooper Kupp‚Äôs wife Anna posts emotional message ahead of Super Bowl 2026
content: Cooper Kupp, the Seattle Seahawks' star player, seems to be fully focused for Super Bowl LX on Sunday as he gears up to take the field against the New England Patriots in Levi Stadium, California. Amid this, his wife, Anna, has shared a few words that reflect how the family is gearing up for the big day and how she is supporting him.

title: 'It's over. Guys are gone': What James Harden and the Clippers realized before the shocking trade
content: The Harden trade was a mutual recognition as much as an admission -- that the 11-time All-Star had a better chance to win elsewhere, and a tumultuous era in LA was effectively over.

title: What NBA insiders are watching amid trade deadline aftermath
content: Tim Bontemps canvases the league after the deadline's grand finale, which now sets up a fascinating summer.

title: Ex-MLB player Puig found guilty in gambling probe
content: A jury has found ex-major league outfielder Yasiel Puig guilty of obstruction of justice and lying to federal officials, the U.S. Attorney's Office said Friday.

title: Hall of Fame envisions changes after '26 outcry
content: Jim Porter said the Hall of Fame plans to return to in-person voting and that the vote will likely happen closer to the annual reveal at NFL Honors -- the Thursday before the Super Bowl.

title: Reverse? Brady backs Kraft, 'get that 7th ring'
content: Tom Brady, who was widely criticized this week after he said he didn't have a "dog in the fight" in Sunday's Super Bowl between the Patriots and Seahawks, indicated in a social media post Friday night that he is backing his former team.

title: St. John's tops UConn as Pitino ties No. 3 in wins
content: St. John's landed its first marquee win of the season Friday night, knocking off No. 3 UConn 81-72 to snap the Huskies' 18-game winning streak in front of an electric crowd at Madison Square Garden.

title: Ex-NFL LB Darron Lee charged in girlfriend's death
content: Former NFL linebacker Darron Lee, the Jets' first-round pick in 2016, was arrested and charged with first-degree murder in the death of his girlfriend, the Hamilton County (Tennessee) Sheriff's Office announced Friday.

title: Source: WNBA gives new CBA proposal to players
content: The WNBA submitted its latest CBA proposal to the union Friday, a source told ESPN, ending a more than six-week wait from the players association for a counter to its last offer.

title: Sources: Goldschmidt, Yanks finalizing 1-year deal
content: First baseman Paul Goldschmidt is finalizing a one-year contract to return to the Yankees, sources told ESPN's Jeff Passan on Friday.

title: Sources: Kingsbury joining McVay's Rams staff
content: Former Commanders offensive coordinator Kliff Kingsbury is joining the Rams' coaching staff, sources told ESPN.

title: üí∞ The 60 bets to make on Super Bowl 60
content: We navigated the thousands of bets being offered for Super Bowl LX and narrowed it down to our 60 favorite from 10 different categories.

title: One-stop Super Bowl cheat sheet: Everything you need to know about Seahawks-Patriots
content: We have picks, bold predictions, X factors, key matchups, betting notes and more for Super Bowl LX between the Seahawks and Patriots.

title: Milan Cortina Olympics: Best moments from the Games' opening ceremony
content: The 2026 Milan Cortina Olympics officially got underway Friday. Here are the top moments from the opening ceremony.

title: Who you calling old? At the 2026 Olympics, age is just a number
content: Lindsey Vonn, Nick Goepper and others are in their golden years at the Olympics. Just don't call them old.

title: Swami Sez: Chris Berman picks the winner of Super Bowl LX
content: Boomer has correctly picked the winner in five of the past seven years. Which preseason long shot is he picking Sunday?

title: Lunardi's Bracketology tiers for every high-major men's basketball conference
content: Breaking down the March Madness potential for every team from the ACC, Big East, Big Ten, Big 12 and SEC.

title: Women's Bracketology: Are the No. 1 seeds already locked in?
content: Texas' win over LSU on Thursday makes it tougher for teams such as the Tigers or Vanderbilt to get to a 1-seed.

title: Super Bowl LX betting buzz: Bettor places $1,000 MVP wagers on Super Bowl kickers
content: Multiple sportsbooks have reported taking MVP wagers on long shots, including a variety of Seahawks defenders.

title: The team that Mike Vrabel built: ÔªøHow the Patriots found success so fast
content: There were five key points over the past year that set New England on track to face the Seahawks on Sunday.

title: No Spanish? No problem: Bad Bunny promises a party at halftime
content: Ahead of Sunday's halftime show, Bad Bunny reassured fans that his performance is meant to be felt, not translated.

title: An intradivision swap? Houston making moves? MLB trade proposals that could shake up the start of spring training
content: Who has too many players at one position? Who has a big hole to fill? We found the biggest and propose deals to fix the imbalances.

title: Olney and Passan's offseason lessons -- and what they mean for baseball's future
content: From more outrage over big spending to the deals that never happened, here's what we learned this winter.

title: Wetzel: Standing on the brink of anything-goes NCAA eligibility
content: By not controlling who is eligible, the NCAA is losing the ability to function as an organizing athletic body.

title: The best of the 2026 recruiting class, by position
content: How elite are the Nos. 1 and 2 recruits in the 2026 class? We analyze each position and break down who can be sleepers.

title: Reid's updated NFL draft rankings: Who jumped up the board after the Senior Bowl?
content: Jordan Reid ranked the top 50 players in the 2026 NFL draft class, including scouting reports and standouts at every position.

title: Fight managers outline how the revamped PFL can be successful
content: With new leadership and stars such as Usman Nurmagomedov on the roster, does the PFL have all the right pieces?

title: Boxing real or not: Gervonta will fight again, Garcia finally wins a title, more
content: Our panel discusses Gervonta Davis' future, Ryan Garcia's title chances, Tyson Fury's return and more.

title: Carrick has restored hope to Man United, but it's what comes next that matters
content: Michael Carrick's three-game winning streak has certainly lifted the mood at Old Trafford. But building on this early form will truly test Man United's mettle.

title: Road to $1M paydays: How WNBA salaries evolved with each CBA
content: For the first time, a $1 million base salary is expected in the new WNBA CBA, and the cap could see a 230% increase.

title: From AD and Harden to Zubac and Vucevic: Fantasy reaction to the latest NBA trades
content: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody provide fantasy reactions as trades go down leading up to Thursday's NBA trade deadline.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea keen on Aston Villa's Morgan Rogers
content: Chelsea are eyeing Aston Villa's Morgan Rogers, while Barcelona have decided to sign Marcus Rashford. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Baldur's Gate TV show coming to HBO
content: Craig Mazin, showrunner for "The Last of Us" and "Chernobyl," will be bringing Baldur's Gate's iconic characters to television.

title: Madden NFL 26 available on EA Play subscription ahead of the Super Bowl
content: Players can also claim a limited-time Supercharge Pack for Ultimate Team as part of their subscription.

title: Strengthens ‚ÄòMake in India‚Äô: PM Modi hails India-US trade deal; thanks Trump
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: Wheat, rice, poultry, milk off the table: What agriculture sector gains from India-US trade deal
content: the TOI Business Desk is a vigilant and dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant business news from around the world to readers of the Times of India . the desk ensures that TOI readers are well-informed about the ever-changing and dynamic world of commerce .

title: Kashmir minimum temperature rises; snowfall in higher reaches brings down day temperature
content: Gulmarg ski resort in north Kashmir's Baramulla district recorded a low of minus 6.5 degrees Celsius, making it the coldest place in the valley

title: 12 Zilla Parishads, 125 Panchayat Samitis go to polls in Maharashtra
content: Polling will continue till 5:30 p.m., while counting of votes will begin at 10 a.m. on February 9, after which the model code of conduct will be lifted

title: President Murmu emphasises on making digital financial literacy part of school curriculum
content: India‚Äôs fintech story should be remembered not only as a tale of technology, but also as one of gender justice, she said

title: BJP names Ritu Tawde as Mumbai Mayor candidate, Shiv Sena picks Sanjay Ghadi for deputy post
content: Sanjay Ghadi will serve for 15 months; with this, the Shiv Sena intends to give an opportunity to four of its corporators

title: Senior IPS officer booked by Delhi police for illegal raids, confinement and extortion
content: According to the FIR, the senior IPS officer conducted several unauthorised raids, unlawfully detained a foreign national and attempted to extort 55 lakh rupees between November 26 and November 29

title: Manipur CM calls for calm amid protests in Kuki-majority areas
content: Normal life in the Kuki-majority Churachandpur district was affected after two tribal bodies imposed a "total shutdown"

title: Mizoram Health Minister bats for behavioural approach to prevent HIV
content: "The ABC approach remains the core principle in our fight against HIV. Returning to these basics is essential to ensure a risk-free future for our youth," says Health Minister

title: Pappu Yadav's health deteriorates after arrest, shifted to Patna hospital
content: After police arrived to take him into custody at his Patna residence, Mr. Yadav expressed fear about his safety

title: At least six killed, three injured as truck rams into bus on Yamuna Expressway in Mathura
content: Efforts are on to trace the truck's driver who is at large; ex-gratia compensation to be provided to kin of deceased, injured

title: India-U.S. interim trade deal: ‚ÄòNamaste Trump scored over Howdy Modi‚Äô, says Congress
content: The Opposition party also took a jibe at the government with the iconic line from the Mukesh song "Dost dost na raha" from the 1964 film "Sangam"

title: Actor Mohanlal, producer Antony Perumbavoor exonerated in 2007 film dispute case
content: Upholding a lower court verdict, Kozhikode sessions court exonerates the duo stating that the charges brought against them were devoid of merit

title: Paruveta Utsavam: an ancient ritual steeped in social harmony
content: Happening uninterruptedly for the past six centuries, Paruveta Utsavam is a paragon of socio-religious unity and enduring traditions. The idol of Lord Narasimha is taken to every street and household in 33 villages and the God is believed to bless devotees irrespective of their caste and religion

title: U.S. to remove additional 25% duty on Indian goods from February 7
content: According to an executive order issued by the White House, India has also committed to a framework with the U.S. to expand defence cooperation over the next 10 years

title: Will aim to deepen defence, economic ties with Malaysia, says PM Modi
content: "The historic ties between India and Malaysia have seen steadfast progress in recent years," Mr. Modi said in a departure statement

title: Godavari phase 2&3¬†pipes to be numbered, geo-tagged,¬†monitored¬†via app
content: The project initiated in September last year by Chief Minster A. Revanth Reddy, in addition to supplying drinking water, will be used in the rejuvenation of the Musi and filling up the Osmansagar and Himayatsagar reservoirs

title: India-U.S. framework strengthens ‚ÄòMake in India‚Äô by opening new opportunities for farmers, says PM Modi
content: The Prime Minister said ‚ÄúIndia and the United States share a commitment to promoting innovation and this framework will further deepen investment and technology partnerships between us‚Äù

title: Navjot Kaur Sidhu expelled from Congress, days after she ‚Äòquit‚Äô party
content: Navjot Kaur Sidhu, wife of senior Congress leader Navjot Singh Sidhu, countered by launching a sharp attack, in an apparent dig at party leader Rahul Gandhi

title: India successfully tests fires nuclear capable Agni-3 missile off Odisha coast
content: The surface-to-surface missile was launched by the personnel of Strategic Forces Command (SFC) from a mobile launcher as part of a regular training exercise for the user

title: A panchayat dream and a daughter‚Äôs murder
content: On January 29, a girl‚Äôs body was found in the Nizam Sagar distributary canal in Telangana‚Äôs Nizamabad. The police say the girl‚Äôs father killed her, his firstborn, so that his wife could contest the panchayat election. Under Maharashtra‚Äôs rules, candidates with more than two children cannot contest local elections and the couple had three. Marri Ramu travels to Nizamabad and Nanded to trace the sequence of the tragedy

title: India to lower duties on all U.S. industrial goods, many agri products; secures various tariff commitments
content: A joint statement by the two countries said they could modify commitments if the other country changes its agreed-upon tariffs. The statement also did not mention Russian oil

title: Gujarat‚Äôs Chhari-Dhandh on global Ramsar Map
content: Gujarat Forest and Environment Minister Arjun Modhwadia, on behalf of the Forest Department, presented the Ramsar Site certificate to Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel in Gandhinagar

title: Focus laid on integrating traditional architecture with modern practices at India Stonemart
content: Rajasthan‚Äôs stone and architecture were recognised worldwide because of their distinct qualities, Deputy CM Diya Kumari said

title: Congress decision to go solo wont impact Left Front‚Äôs prospect in WB Assembly polls: Md Salim
content: The Congress party on February 5, 2026, announced that it will contest independently in all the 294 Assembly constituencies in West Bengal, ending speculation of any electoral understanding with the Left Front in the polls due in next few months

title: Products by Haryana jail inmates attracting crowd at Surajkund Crafts Festival in Faridabad
content: A press statement issued by the Haryana Public Relations Department said that products made by the inmates were available at stalls number 1130 to 1133, 1135 and 1136, set up by the Prisons Department at the fair

title: Independent MP Pappu Yadav arrested in Patna in a 31-year old case
content: High drama unfolded at Pappu Yadav‚Äôs house in Mandiri locality when a police team arrived to execute a warrant issued by an MP/MLA court in the case registered under section 467 (forgery of documents) of the Indian Penal Code

title: India trashes Pakistan's allegations of Indian link to Islamabad bombing
content: ‚ÄúIt is unfortunate that, instead of seriously addressing the problems plaguing its social fabric, Pakistan should choose to delude itself by blaming others for its home-grown ills,‚Äù the Ministry of External Affairs said

title: Tripura council poll: no alliance call yet by BJP, ally IPFT keen on tie-up
content: Move comes close on the heels of a statement by CM Manik Saha, who hinted at independently contesting the election to the tribal district council

title: Over the years, DMK and Congress have forged a mutually complementary electoral tie-up
content: In the 2024 Lok Sabha election, even though the national party lagged behind the Dravidian party in terms of vote share in contested seats, the margin was less than one percentage point; the narrow gap in vote shares indicates that all the parties in the alliance benefit from one another

title: 3 convicted in Hampi gang rape and murder case
content: The case had drawn national and international attention following the brutal sexual assault on two women, including a foreign tourist, and the killing of an Indian male tourist near the UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2025

title: Engineers should evince interest in defence research, says NITI Aayog member
content: The Centre has significantly increased the allocation for defence sector to ensure that India‚Äôs defence capabilities remain globally competitive, says Saraswat

title: Top Maoist leader Prabhakar, six others killed in Gadchiroli operations
content: One C-60 jawan died during operation, another injured; the police have so far recovered three AK-47 rifles, one SLR and one .303 rifle from the location

title: Class 8 student allegedly raped while returning from school in Mauganj, M.P.
content: An FIR has been filed at the Mauganj police station for gang-rape and abduction, and two of the accused have been arrested

title: Kerala MP moves private Bill to conduct Census every ten years
content: Bill introduced in RS by IUML MP Haris Beeran notes six-year delay in Census after 2011; warns that reservation and other social justice policies cannot be pursued effectively without correct population and caste data

title: U.P. SIR gets fourth extension, final voter list in April
content: Election Commission says it extended the period for filing of claims and objections by 30 days following a request from the State‚Äôs Chief Electoral Officer

title: Work on second phase of metro likely to be completed by Dec. 2026, says¬†KMRL
content: KMRL¬†managing director cites delays in piling caused by detection of a gas pipeline between¬†Alinchuvadu¬†and¬†Padamugal, and the unavailability of land for¬†Chembumukku¬†and¬†Padamugal¬†stations as major obstacles to meeting the June deadline

title: Amit Shah calls for hi-tech solutions to secure J&K border amid UAV threat
content: Emerging challenges driven by advanced technology must be countered with equally advanced technological solutions. The challenges faced some years ago are completely different from those faced today, says Union Home Minister Amit Shah

title: CPI(M) MP moves Right to Disconnect Bill in Rajya Sabha
content: Bill seeks strict enforcement of official working hours; MP says the ‚Äòalways-on‚Äô digital work culture has taken a toll on employees

title: Modi signed a ‚Äòtrap deal‚Äô on U.S. pressure: Congress
content: Kharge says PM surrendered before Trump because of Epstein files, sacrificed India‚Äôs farmers, and has no courage to face Opposition queries; MPs say govt. failed to share details of trade agreement

title: UDF to spotlight ‚ÄòKerala crisis‚Äô in Puthuyuga Yatra
content: The 30-day yatra aims to engage citizens and showcase a vision for a reformed Kerala. Front leaders highlight financial distress, youth migration, and failing governance under the LDF, accusing the government of shielding gold smuggling suspects.

title: ED attaches properties worth ‚Çπ7.81 crore in cheating case
content: The attachment was made as equivalent value to the proceeds of crime under Section 5(1) of the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA), 2002

title: Itinerant tiger leaves fresh pug marks in Jangaon district
content: Forest Department informed that the pug marks were found outside the Mandelagudem village in Raghunathpally mandal of Jangaon district on Friday

title: Election Commission directives ignored, disabled people made to wait in queue for SIR hearings in Bengal
content: Despite Election Commission exemptions, disabled persons report long waits, inadequate¬†facilities¬†and distress during SIR¬†hearing

title: Quantum ecosystem in Amaravati will benefit generations, says APSCHE chief
content: Amaravati Quantum Valley Hackathon- 2025 sees participation of 50,000 students from across six States

title: Service organisations welcome five-day week proposal for govt. staff
content: Weekly loss of seven working hours resulting from a  five-day week can be made up by rearranging daily working hours, suggest organisations

title: Supreme Court allows abortion of 30-week pregnancy of a minor, upholds right to reproductive autonomy
content: The court also said that there were cases in which women may have no other option but take the dangerous and life-threatening alternative of turning to quacks for an abortion

title: Suspicious death: viscera samples, phone of PG doctor sent to FSL
content: Body of Dr. Deepika handed over to parents; Women‚Äôs Commission Chairperson Rayapati Sailaja enquires about the case

title: CyberPeace Summit 2026 to address cybercrime, AI risks, misinformation
content: Global CyberPeace Summit in New Delhi to focus on digital governance, infrastructure protection, and online safety challenges

title: Thiruvananthapuram tops list of districts with most number of stray dog bites
content: 58,108 persons sought treatment for stray dog bites in the district‚Äôs government hospitals in 2025. Kerala reported 3.69 lakh dog bites last year

title: $120 million committed to Chabahar port in Iran completely paid: India
content: Iranian Ambassador says India has conveyed no information on future of project; MEA tells Parliament India has disbursed its total commitment of ‚Çπ120 million before the U.S. sanctions waiver ends in April

title: ED summons actor Jayaram in Sabarimala gold theft case
content: The actor had then denied any wrongdoing and said he had no links with the company where the replating of gold-clad artefacts of the temple was done or its sponsors

title: Tadoba tiger that swam two rivers and crossed three States tranquilised in East Godavari
content: After a 53-day movement through forest corridors and inhabited areas, the transient male tiger is secured in a cattle shed at Kurmapuram village on Friday evening, forest officials say. They add that the animal does not attack any human during its long journey and is in stable condition, with a decision yet to be taken on shifting it to a zoo or a rescue centre

title: Will consider high-speed rail if State interested, says Union Minister
content: Union Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw says in Rajya Sabha that the SilverLine semi-high-speed rail project proposed by Kerala is not feasible as it will major environmental impact

title: GBA to revive 194 unused public spaces across Bengaluru
content: Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA) Chief Commissioner M. Maheshwar Rao encouraged citizen involvement in the¬†revitalisation¬†of public spaces within GBA limits

title: Torch, meet Zlatan: Milan legend serves as Olympic torchbearer
content: former internazionale and AC Milan player Zlatan Ibrahimovic carried the Olympic Torch through the streets of Milan . he spent nine illustrious years with the two Milanese clubs, scoring 133 goals . his career took him everywhere from MLS to MLS ' LA Galaxy' before retiring in 2023 .

title: Minnesota's James deal is a low-risk marriage of convenience
content: rodrguez has signed a six-month contract with the Loons . the 34-year-old has a club option to finish the 2026 season in the Twin Cities . he's expected to maintain his lynchpin role for Colombia .

title: 2026 NFL Honors: Who won the league's biggest awards?
content: the best of the NFL gathered at the Palace of Fine Arts in San Francisco for Thursday's Super Bowl honors . the Seattle Seahawks and new England Patriots meet at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California, for super bowl lX . quarterback Matthew Stafford won the biggest prize -- MVP .

title: 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame: Meet the new members
content: quarterback Drew Brees is one of two quarterbacks to throw for more than 80,000 yards . wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald will also be in the 2026 Hall class . he finished second only to Hall of Famer Jerry Rice in career receptions .

title: America's Super Bowl LX game plan: Couches, wings and wagers
content: the Seattle Seahawks and new England Patriots are preparing for super Bowl LX . fans are mapping out their own game plans . a seton hall poll conducted Jan. 27-30 surveillance poll reveals the rest of the country is handling the biggest Sunday of the year .

title: 'Many can be CM': Ahead of civic polls, Siddaramaiah's son quashes CM-change buzz
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: What fantasy basketball managers should do with red-hot Cooper Flagg, Saddiq Bey
content: Cooper Flagg has been the best player in fantasy over the last two weeks . he has averaged 33.4 points, 1.8 3-pointers, 8.8 rebounds, 4.8 assists, 0.8 steals and 1.4 blocks on 53% shooting from the field . the Mavericks are not, getting victories in just three of thei .

title: NHL Awards Watch: Kucherov gaining on MacKinnon for MVP?
content: it's not that Miller won the Vezina Trophy in the same season he backstopped Team USA to an overtime loss in the gold medal round at the Vancouver Games . a great goal from Nathan MacKinnon puts the Avalanche up 2-0 over the Red Wings .

title: All About Ritu Tawde, BJP's Mumbai Mayor Candidate
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) on Saturday named Ritu Tawde as its candidate for the post of Mayor of the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC).

title: An Anniversary Cake Kept Waiting As Delhi Biker Met With Tragic End
content: Kamal Dhyani fell to his death in a construction pit in Delhi's Janakpuri while he was on his way home to celebrate his parent's wedding anniversary.

title: South Korean Crypto Firm Accidentally Sends $40 Billion In Bitcoin To Users
content: A South Korean cryptocurrency exchange apologised on Saturday after mistakenly transferring more than $40 billion worth of bitcoin to users, which briefly prompted a selloff on the platform.

title: BJP's Ritu Tawde To Be Mumbai Mayor, Shiv Sena Leader Named As Her Deputy
content: BJP's Ritu Tawde has been appointed as the Mumbai Mayor, making it the first time in 25 years that the post has been held by a party other than the Shiv Sena.

title: As PM Modi Begins 2-Day Visit, A Look At India-Malaysia Diplomatic Ties
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is embarking on a state visit to Malaysia on February 7 and 8. On his third visit to Malaysia and first since the two nations raised their relationship to the level of a Comprehensive Strategic Partnership in August 2024.

title: China's High-Power 'Microwave Weapon' That Can Damage Satellites In Space
content: China has developed a high-power microwave system that could one day be used to disrupt satellite networks such as SpaceX's Starlink.

title: 7 US-Iran Flashpoints That Escalated Regional Tensions
content: The US and Iran on Friday were trying to reach a diplomatic solution to disputes between the two nations that have led to heightened tensions in the Middle East, and warnings from President Donald Trump that military options are at his disposal

title: UP Woman, 27, Accidentally Hangs Herself While Filming Reel
content: In a shocking reminder of how social media addiction and the craze for reel-making can turn deadly, a young woman in Uttar Pradesh's Banda district lost her life while attempting to film a video.

title: In India-US Trade Framework, Washington's Kashmir Message To Islamabad
content: Jammu and Kashmir is an integral part of India. As much as Pakistan debates this simple fact, the most hard-hitting acceptance has come from one of its most trusted allies and the biggest superpower, the United States.

title: Search Operations Intensified For Missing Odisha Sailor
content: The Directorate General of Shipping said it has initiated a multi-agency response to locate Odisha sailor Sarthak Mohapatra who went missing from a vessel at sea on February 3.

title: Casual Porn Search Turns Into Nightmare After Man Finds Himself On Screen
content: What began as a casual search for porn online quickly turned into a nightmare when a man realised the couple in the video was him and his girlfriend.

title: Elderly Karnataka Woman, Son, 2 Daughters Found Hanging At Bihar Ashram
content: Four tourists, including three women, from Karnataka were found hanging in their room at a dharmshala in Bihar's Nalanda district on Friday, a police official said.

title: On Camera, 2 Men Beaten Up By Pub Bouncers At Popular Noida Mall
content: The incident, which was captured on camera, shows 3-4 bouncers kicking and punching both men during the fight. One man fell to the ground, but the bouncers continued to hit him even after he was down.

title: Indian-Origin Businessman Found Guilty In Drink Spike Case In UK
content: An Indian-origin businessman on trial in London was on Friday found guilty of intentionally spiking the drink of a woman with a dangerous drug at a nightclub two years ago.

title: Delhi-NCR Warms Up, Air Quality Stays In 'Poor' Category
content: Delhi-NCR witnessed a gradual rise in temperatures as residents woke up to bright sunshine on Saturday, even as the region's air quality continued to remain in the 'poor' category.

title: Trump Favours High Defence Spending Nations As Customers For US Weapons
content: US President Donald Trump signed an executive order that would re-prioritize the customer list for US weapons in favor of countries with higher defense spending and strategic importance in their region, the White House said on Friday.

title: Ola, Uber And Rapido Drivers On Strike Today: Their 2 Big Demands
content: Commuters across India may face travel disruptions on Saturday, as drivers working for ride-hailing apps such as Ola, Uber and Rapido are on a coordinated nationwide strike.

title: Sheikh Hasina: The Rise, Rule And Downfall Of Bangladesh's 'Iron Lady'
content: Bangladesh General Election 2026: For nearly two decades, Sheikh Hasina stood as one of the most powerful faces in Bangladesh's politics. She was often described as the country's "Iron Lady."

title: Pentagon Calls Harvard "Woke", Ends Military Training, Fellowship Programmes
content: The Pentagon said Friday it is cutting ties with Harvard University, ending all military training, fellowships and certificate programmes with the Ivy League institution.

title: UP YouTuber Shadab Jakati Charged With Rape After Woman's Complaint
content: Police have registered an FIR against YouTuber Shadab Jakati on the charges of rape following a complaint filed by a woman, and initiated a probe into the matter, police said.

title: NHL Power Rankings: Updated 1-32 poll heading into Olympic break
content: snubs, injuries and countries not participating bolster debate about the tournament . the theme of this week's Power Rankings is who is the "top" player from each NHL team that isn't on an Olympic roster going to Milan . it's quite possible that Nichushkin would have also been boarding a plane overseas .

content: the Seattle Seahawks and new England Patriots meet in super bowl lX on sunday . the game has become battlefields between teams trying to create and prevent explosive plays . defenses have leaned into Vic Fangio-style philosophies and continued to raise their rates of two-high safety looks .
